name: Chapter 7: Action Plan
short_description: Armed with the complete message, the Enterprise and Codarians develop an action plan to prevent the cosmic event. They must devise a strategy to re-code ancient astronomical algorithms to alter the course of the impending disaster.
from_prev_chapter: The crew prepares to take action based on the fully decoded message.
to_next_chapter: The plan is set in motion, and the team begins the complex task of re-coding algorithms on a cosmic scale.
